video.title: Myth Hunters
video.synopsis: From Noah's Ark to King Solomon's Mines, this show investigates history's most famous myths and the people who were obsessed with finding them.

episodes.synopsis: Creationist J. Randall Price leads an expedition to find Noah's Ark in Turkey, using clues from the Bible.
episodes.title: The Quest for Noah's Ark

episodes.synopsis: After Nazi armies advanced into Austria, Hitler's first act in Vienna was to acquire a spear that was allegedly used to pierce Jesus on the cross.
episodes.title: Hitler and the Spear of Destiny

episodes.synopsis: Richard Knight traveled the world as a casual laborer to make ends meet, but his obsession with the story of Captain Kidd's treasure changed his life.
episodes.title: The Hunt for Pirate Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Queen of Sheba brought King Solomon gold from the mystical Ophir. But where was Ophir? Ancient Greeks and modern-day scientists alike have searched.
episodes.title: The Real King Solomon's Mines

episodes.synopsis: In 1941, the Germans looted one of the Soviet Union's most important artworks, the Amber Room, taking an extraordinary series of C18 amber screens.
episodes.title: The Missing 8th Wonder of the World

episodes.synopsis: The 13th-century Honjo Masamune is perhaps the greatest Japanese sword ever made, but it disappeared in the aftermath of World War II.
episodes.title: The Lost Sword of the Samurai

episodes.synopsis: Said to be the cup used by Christ at the last supper, the Holy Grail is believed by many to hold miraculous powers and has been sought for centuries.
episodes.title: Himmler and the Holy Grail

episodes.synopsis: The Book of Spells is one of the most influential books ever written, but after decades of looking for it, the original text remains elusive.
episodes.title: The Hunt for the Book of Spells

episodes.synopsis: British explorer Percy Fawcett searches for El Dorado, a legendary lost city of gold rumored to have housed thousands of people in the Amazon jungle.
episodes.title: The Lost City of El Dorado

episodes.synopsis: The so-called “Book of Power” was a document deemed so critical to Nazi ideology that German soldiers were sent to retrieve it at any cost.
episodes.title: The Nazis and the Book of Power

episodes.synopsis: Amateur adventurer Ron Wyatt claimed he found the long-sought Ark of the Covenant, but professional archaeologists remain highly skeptical.
episodes.title: Raider Ron and the Lost Ark

episodes.synopsis: After finding a mysterious crystal skull in the Central American jungle, Anna Mitchell-Hedges became convinced that the object had telepathic powers.
episodes.title: The Search for the Crystal Skulls

episodes.synopsis: A German historian sets out to establish the authenticity of the Titulus Crucis, a small wooden sign that, it's claimed, hung on the cross of Christ.
episodes.title: The Quest for the True Cross

episodes.synopsis: Archaeologist Raleigh Radford believes he may have found the final resting place of King Arthur under the remains of a 12th-century abbey.
episodes.title: The Search for King Arthur's Bones

episodes.synopsis: In the days following the Civil War, a young ranch hand believes he holds a map to a massive vein of gold in Arizona's Superstition Mountains.
episodes.title: The Secret of Superstition Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Professor Juris Zarins draws on the Bible, geography, archaeology and other sources in his search for the Garden of Eden.
episodes.title: The Hunt for the Garden of Eden

episodes.synopsis: Tragedy and sacrifice haunt treasure hunter Mel Fisher's quest to find the Atocha, a lost Spanish galleon laden with treasure.
episodes.title: The Search for Our Lady of Atocha

episodes.synopsis: In the early 20th century, a young archaeologist seeks Ivan the Terrible's lost library, rumored to hold original works by Homer, Aristotle and Plato.
episodes.title: The Lost Library of Ivan the Terrible

episodes.synopsis: Amateur treasure hunters claim that a lethal curse and undead warriors protect the untold wealth of Aztec emperor Montezuma.
episodes.title: The Curse of Montezuma's Gold

episodes.synopsis: The "French Indiana Jones" goes in search of the remains of his nation's greatest heroine, Joan of Arc.
episodes.title: The Relics of Joan of Arc

episodes.synopsis: British adventurer Sir Arthur Evans' obsession with finding the legendary labyrinth leads to some shocking discoveries on the isle of Crete.
episodes.title: The Quest for the Minotaur's Labyrinth

episodes.synopsis: A South African newspaper editor believes he may have found the hiding place of a cache of gold hidden a century earlier during the Boer War.
episodes.title: The Legend of Kruger's Millions

episodes.synopsis: Between the world wars, the Nazis recruit a young scientist to find the lost city of Atlantis, which they believe holds the key to their ancestry.
episodes.title: The Nazi Hunt for Atlantis

episodes.synopsis: German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann accomplishes the impossible and fulfills a lifelong dream when he excavates the legendary city of Troy.
episodes.title: Myth Hunters: Series 2: The Lost Jewels of Helen of Troy

episodes.synopsis: Found among the hundreds of papyrus Dead Sea Scrolls in 1946 was a single scroll of copper, which may lead the way to ancient buried treasure.
episodes.title: Myth Hunters: Series 2: The Secret within the Dead Sea Scroll

episodes.synopsis: A family feud over a ten-trillion-yen treasure buried by 19th-century shogun warriors unfolds over three generations.
episodes.title: Myth Hunters: Series 2: The Shogun's Lost Treasure

episodes.synopsis: A 19th-century German adventurer's quest for buried treasure leads him around the world to a mist-shrouded island off the coast of Costa Rica.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: A legend promising a vast treasure of Spanish gold buried in Texas spurs a man's seven-year mission to unravel the mystery of Spider Rocks.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: A priest in a 19th-century French village acquires sudden wealth, causing some to believe he uncovered the Holy Grail and was paid for his silence.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: A journalist sets out in search of a piece of cloth believed to be the only existing image of Jesus, created on the day of Christ's crucifixion.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: In 1911, a young scholar living a life of wealth and comfort follows a restless impulse to an ancient site in the Andes and discovers Machu Picchu.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A Filipino treasure hunter searches for a huge cache of gold stashed away during World War II through a covert scheme by the Japanese Imperial Army.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: A Mexican War veteran and Gold Rush prospector sets out into the Mojave desert hoping to make an astonishing find: a lost Spanish galleon.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: A 1959 search is organized to find boxes containing half a billion dollars in gold, stolen by the Nazis and dropped by SS officers into a remote lake.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Brothers hunt for a fortune in gold ore found in the 1800s that was buried in Virginia's Blue Ridge Mountains at a location recorded in a secret code.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: An archaeologist looks for historic proof of King Arthur's existence in the form of Excalibur, the remains of the Round Table or Camelot itself.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Two amateur explorers trek through the jungles of Central America and find the remnants of the vast, extraordinary Maya civilization.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: A cryptic map drawn by the sole survivor of a doomed expedition provides the only clue to the location of a legendary, and perhaps cursed, treasure.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: An American writer traveling in Spain sees a relic alleged to be the Holy Grail and traces its journey from first-century Israel to the present.
episodes.title: Episode 13
